text: Jhulia dos Santos (born 18 September 1991) is a visually impaired Brazilian sprinter. Competing in the T11 classification, Dos Santos represented Brazil at the 2012 Summer Paralympics in London winning a bronze medal in the 100m sprint. She is also a multiple World Championships and Parapan American medalist, taking five medals over four tournaments. == References == Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian female sprinters Category:Paralympic athletes of Brazil Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Brazil Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in athletics (track and field)
title: Jhulia Dos Santos
